quest.name: Mammets on Fire
journal: Serendipity is quite pleased to see you.

Roroton, the merchant for whom you previously crafted a pair of malachite earrings, has commissioned you to make a fire brand of peerless quality. Craft the item to the best of your ability and present it to Serendipity for inspection.

As usual, Gigi assists with the evaluation of your work. However, in an unusual turn of events, your fire brand appears to trigger bizarre pyromaniac tendencies hidden deep within the mammet's soul. Nevertheless, Serendipity assures you that there is no need for concern, and that she will see that Roroton receives his order without incident.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 40.
objectives: Deliver a fire brand to Serendipity.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I've been waiting for you, Forename.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: You remember Roroton, the merchant for whom you made those exquisite earrings? He paid a visit not long ago, hoping to find you present. In fact, he was positively heartbroken that he couldn't speak with you in person.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Ahaha, it's hard to believe he was once so furious with us! It's as if that unfortunate incident never happened at all!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But returning to the matter at hand, Roroton has commissioned you to craft a fire brand─one of peerless quality, of course.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: When you've finished, I must insist that I evaluate your work. It's not that I don't trust your craftsmanship, but Roroton is an important client, to say the least.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Is the fire brand ready yet, Forename?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: All right, Gigi! I know this is your first evaluation in a long while, but I'm sure you can handle it!

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
FiRe...BrAnD...bUrN, bUrN, mAkE iT bUrN tHeM!

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text: GiGi Is ThE oNe TrUe LoRd Of ThE iNfErNo! MwAhAhAhAh!!!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: No, Gigi, no! What did I tell you!? No fires!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Please forgive him, Forename. I might have knocked something loose when performing maintenance earlier...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But I'm certain it's nothing important. Really! Other than the occasional outburst, he's been relatively stable. ...Well, for Gigi, anyway.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, the scepter! I must say that you've once again done a marvelous job. I'm particularly impressed by how well you set the eye of fire in the scepter.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: This gemstone is the focal point of the design, both aesthetically and practically speaking. It is what allows a thaumaturge to channel the aetherial energies within...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And it's what transforms the piece from common instrument of death into stunning work of art!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Any veteran thaumaturge would doubtless be satisfied by both the quality and efficacy of this fire brand. I just know Roroton will be happy to receive it!

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text: I sAy We GiVe HiM tHe GiFt ThAt KeEpS oN gIvInG! i SaY wE gIvE hIm ThE gIfT oF fIrE!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Gigi! There will be absolutely no gift giving on my watch! Have I made myself clear!?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: <sigh> You can leave the rest to me, Forename. I'll see that Roroton receives your fire brand─and nothing else!
